thread.title: Kathleen James

author: Kathleen James
title: Kathleen James
text:
I'm impressed on how they make up the correct diet and amount as my girls are enjoying and putting on weight they are the right weight according to my vets for there age, he even said he may start using tails.com as he has a fussy eater and impressed that They make up the food on the diet they are on to match, and I've not had upset tummies on change over.
And being delivered and able to control my delivery even better I can pause or move date if I need too.
